name: Sciware Defense
description:
it's a Lowpoly 3D FPS/TPS Tower Defence game in a sci-fi world
Corrupted robots are trying to destroy everything on their path, putting turrets and upgrading them you can defend the areas who they are attacking and earn more money to become more powerful and resisting the attacks
Like an normal Tower Defense, in this game you will construct turrets on the path to destroy robots and survive how much you can and unlocking new turrets to reach more longer
